info.female_impression:
Weren't you obsessed with the Starlight Knight series as a kid, Wise?
That brings me back. You shouting "Starlight Mirage!" with your arms crossed...
info.male_impression:
There was never such a time. Please erase such non-existent memories from your mind.
It's been a long time since I was that age, after all, and my name doesn't have "kid" in it.
info.outlook_desc:
Hollow Investigation Association Licensing Archive�
Investigator: Billy. Possesses excellent Ether adaptability and is approved to carry out basic tasks such as extractions within established Hollows (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Ether adaptability for androids depends entirely on their constituent materials. We recommend regular Ether tolerance testing and self-monitoring of component health.
info.profile_desc:
Billy Kid, an AI construct that has passed the forbidden fruit test, is essentially a self-aware machine. 
True to his name, despite having the appearance of a robot, he is quite childlike.
He's a big fan of the visual FX show "Starlight Knight" and wishes to be a hero like the main characters of the show. He often refers to himself as a Starlight Knight and imitates the lines in the show.
Such behavior appears to be only for comedic effect, however.
"Don't make me sound like an idiot! I'm obviously very smart!" � Billy.

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Billy hits an enemy with a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!"
"All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!"
mindscape_cinemas.name: Dazzling Entrance

mindscape_cinemas.description: Billy's Dodge Counter DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his Basic Attacks count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger Perfect Dodges. When a Rolling Shot triggers a Perfect Dodge, it will automatically follow up with a Dodge Counter.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!"
� User "Dreamgirl Monica" from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Roaming Gunslinger

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Billy hits an enemy with his EX Special Attack, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.
Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Starlight Ballistics

mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.
mindscape_cinemas.name: Lost Technological Construct

mindscape_cinemas.description: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a Perfect Dodge, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Hooboy~ Feelin' great! Move aside, Anby, it's my time to shine!"
"Yo, Anby � can you play the Starlight Knight theme?"
�excerpt from Cunning Hares' "Top 10 Forbidden Sentences," selected by Anby
mindscape_cinemas.name: Starlight Hero

descriptions: Billy's DMG increases by 25% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a Chain Attack, the DMG of his next Ultimate is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an Ultimate is activated.
Billy's DMG increases by 29.1% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

Billy's DMG increases by 45.8% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
After Billy uses a Chain Attack, the DMG of his next Ultimate is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an Ultimate is activated.
Billy's DMG increases by 50% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

After Billy uses a Chain Attack, the DMG of his next Ultimate is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an Ultimate is activated.

descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched, press  to activate:
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Power of Teamwork

descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates Vital View.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Evasive Assist: Flash Spin

descriptions.description:
Press  after an Evasive Assist to activate:
Pierces enemies in a large area in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Fatal Shot

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing Physical DMG.
Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration.
Drag the stick/joystick during Crouching Shot to launch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing Physical DMG.
Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
descriptions.name: Basic Attack: Full Firepower

descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Chain Attack: Starlight Mirage

descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Ultimate: Starlight, Shine Bright

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge: Risky Business

descriptions.description:
When dragging the stick/joystick during a dodge, press :
Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing Physical DMG.
When not dragging the stick/joystick during a dodge, press :
Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing Physical DMG.
descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Starlight Sanction

descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Pierces enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Fair Fight

descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing Physical DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
descriptions.name: Special Attack: Stand Still

descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Launches a powerful piercing attack in a line, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Clearance Time
